DOC.brief_summary: The aim study demonstrate efficacy single embryo transfer blastocyst stage ( Day 5 ) co-culture Autologous Endometrial Cell Culture ( AECC ) versus transfer single embryo Day 3 culture conventional medium . Efficacy assess term clinical pregnancy rate 5 8 week embryo transfer .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Endocell® v Conventional Medium Treatment Infertility
DOC.criteria: Women age ≥ 18 ≤ 36 Undergoing ovarian stimulation In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Intra Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) Having experience 1 Embryo Transfer failure With basal FSH level ≤ 12 IU/l within 6 month prior study Endometrial biopsy menstrual cycle precede ovarian stimulation ( 6 12 day document ovulation ) Negative serology HIV 1 2 , hepatitis B C , HTLV 1 2 , syphilis Hypersensitivity one culture medium component Oocyte donation , sperm donation Thawed embryos transfer Women endometriosis grade III IV , chronic endometritis , hydrosalpinx , polycystic ovary , amenorrhoea , anovulation , uterus malformation , uncontrolled prolactinaemia , uterine synechia , uterine fibroma , woman expose distilbene , uterine polyp Women affect pathology associate contraindication pregnant Abnormal gynaecologic bleeding undetermined origin Uncontrolled thyroid ( TSH dosage ) adrenal dysfunction Neoplasias , pathologies endometrium cervix
